snippet.title: 9 Minutes of Sonic X Shadow Generations Gameplay | Summer Game Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Sonic X Shadow Generations is an upcoming remake of Sonic Generations - which, in and of itself, took classic stages from older Sonic games, moving many into a 3D space. With Sonic X Shadow Generations, Shadow will also now be playable, with some of his classic stages also entering the fray. Sonic X Shadow Generations is set to release October 25, 2024.

#gaming #sonicxshadowgenerations  #gamespot
